S

set_background(Button, String, Boolean) - Static method in class main.MainActivity
Its a static method that takes in as parameters a Button, a String and a boolean It sets the size and the background of the button, with the image which name is taken from the string The boolean called selected is used to see if the button is selected for the case of the move_btn and the barrier_btn if the button is selected change the size and margin and add S to the image name
setBarrier() - Method in class components.Border

setBox(Box) - Method in class components.Pawn
 
setCanClick(boolean) - Method in class components.Box
it sets the canClick boolean and changes the color of the button that it gets from the grid using the getNodeByRowColumnInex method in the MainActivity accordingly
setCanClickBorder(boolean) - Method in class components.Plateau
 
setCanClickBox(boolean) - Method in class components.Plateau
 
setClickableBoxes(int) - Method in class components.Plateau
It takes an integer turn as a parameter It sets the boxes that the corresponding pawn can click the setCanClick method also changes their color It simply calls the Neighbors method for the box that the pawn is on, which returns a list of boxes
